title: New stealth/pink ward
body: On the preseason info page, it says that pink wards will no longer see invisible champions, but says nothing about camouflaged champions and their interactions with the new pinks. So will Eve/Twitch ect still be seen by pink wards or no?

replies.body: The new pink wards (Control wards) will see Camouflaged champs (Eve, Twitch, Rengar).
Please tell me that that art isn't final.
The icon, appearance of the Control Ward itself in game and the jamming visual effects are all placeholder. Final versions will end up on the PBE sometime in the next week or two.
do they do anything that pink wards did? or did it just feel right to repackage them as stealth was changing too
